title: Facebook Said To Delete Strike Warnings For Conservative Platforms That Post Misinformation
text: Facebook relaxed its rules so that pages of conservative publications and pundits, including Breitbart and Diamond and Silk, were not penalized for violations of the company’s misinformation policies, according to leaked materials reviewed by NBC News, a day after Buzzfeed reported on other evide.

title: Sensitive to claims of bias, Facebook relaxed misinformation rules for conservative pages
text: According to internal discussions, Facebook removed "strikes" so that conservative pages were not penalized for violations of misinformation policies, NBC News reported.

title: Facebook AI Is Getting Into Agriculture

title: Facebook Takes on TikTok, But That’s Not Why It’s a Buy

title: Facebook gives employees $1,000 as it extends remote work to July 2021
text: It’s looking like Big Tech isn’t going back to the office any time soon. Facebook this week announced that it will allow its employees to work from home until next July, following in the footsteps of Google, which has also told workers to stay home until summer 2021.

title: Facebook Gaming launches without games on iOS due to Apple App Store policies
text: The iOS app doesn't feature mini games like its Android counterpart.

title: Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg is now worth $100bn
text: Mark Zuckerberg has seen his personal wealth hit $100bn (£76bn), 16 years after he co-founded Facebook from his university dorm room.

title: Facebook Gaming Finally Clears Apple Hurdle, Arriving in App Store
text: Saying Apple forced changes during months of rejection, the social network is releasing a version for iPhone and iPad users today.

title: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg is now worth $100 billion
text: Mark Zuckerberg has joined the world's most exclusive club of the ultra rich.

title: Facebook extends coronavirus work from home policy until July 2021
text: Facebook has joined Google in saying it will allow employees to work from home until the middle of next year as a result of the coronavirus pandemic. “Based on guidance from health and government experts, as well as decisions drawn from our internal discussions about these matters, we are allowing employees to continue voluntarily working […]

title: Facebook employees to work from home until July 2021, get $1,000 for home offices
text: Facebook Inc will allow employees to work from home until July 2021 due to the coronavirus outbreak and will give them $1,000 for home office needs, a spokeswoman for the social media giant said on Thursday.
